item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Thursday, October 17, 2024 at 1:10 AM UTC
item.description:
1. AI PCs Aren't Good at AI: The CPU Beats the NPU (222 points | 119 comments)
2. Amazon reveals first color Kindle, new Kindle Scribe, and more (114 points | 220 comments)
3. A solar gravitational lens will be humanity's most powerful telescope (2022) (64 points | 23 comments)

8. Should We Chat, Too? Security Analysis of WeChat's Mmtls Encryption Protocol (90 points | 41 comments)
9. Show HN: Clean News - A cleaner curation of world news events (11 points | 15 comments)
10. FTC announces "click-to-cancel" rule making it easier to cancel subscriptions (1194 points | 562 comments)

14. Reflex (YC W23) Hiring Senior/Staff Engineer – Infrastructure ( | hide)

21. Un Ministral, Des Ministraux (174 points | 77 comments)

23. Making the Python back end for my new webapp (42 points | 30 comments)

25. Winamp deletes entire GitHub source code repo after a rocky few weeks (302 points | 232 comments)
26. Lotus: Diffusion-Based Visual Foundation Model for High-Quality Dense Prediction (9 points | discuss)
27. Medical student's apparent celiac disease responded to giardiasis treatment (171 points | 101 comments)
28. FIDO Alliance publishes new spec to let users move passkeys across providers (166 points | 144 comments)
29. Ireland's big school secret: how a year off-curriculum changes teenage lives (141 points | 88 comments)
